title: Trikona Teardrop Diamond Dangler Earrings
materials: White Diamonds. The gold features a radiant
hand-applied Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: These earrings feature a contemporary design with three cascading triangle motifs. Each triangle contains a central, triangle-cut polki diamond, surrounded by a pave setting of brilliant-cut white diamonds. The open setting allows for maximum light refraction, enhancing the stones' natural brilliance. The triangles are delicately linked, creating a graceful movement.
colors: milky white of the Polki diamonds and the dazzling white of the surrounding diamonds. This creates a beautiful contrast that is both elegant and eye-catching.
occasions: Perfect for modern celebrations like receptions and cocktail parties
or to add a touch of contemporary flair to traditional South Indian attire for events like Sangeet or a friend's wedding.
description: These earrings offer a unique blend of modern design and traditional diamond cutting. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the use of polki diamonds lends a touch of heritage. The geometric design ensures the piece will be modern and on trend for years to come.
